about_the_game:
The powerful ultimate pet of the Bahamut generation - Dinosaurs!
Purchase this DLC to find your mother to receive a dinosaur pet at the beginning of the game!
detailed_description:
The powerful ultimate pet of the Bahamut generation - Dinosaurs!
Purchase this DLC to find your mother to receive a dinosaur pet at the beginning of the game!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better. Not supported: macOS Big Sur 11.0 and later.
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better. Not supported: macOS Big Sur 11.0 and later.
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Bahamut2-dragon's bride-Powerful Pet:Dinosaur

subs.option_text: 巴哈姆特2-龍之新娘-Powerful Pet:Dinosaur - $0.99

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
